title: PR Resolution and Dependency Updates
description: Epic to track resolution of all open PRs and update dependencies for react-cats project. This includes security updates, major dependency upgrades, and GitHub Actions updates.

title: Security: Update lodash to v4.17.23 (PR #94)
description: Review and merge PR #94: Update dependency lodash to v4.17.23 [security]. This is a critical security update.

title: GitHub Actions: Update actions/cache to v5 (PR #93)
description: Review and merge PR #93: Update actions/cache action to v5. GitHub Actions maintenance update.

title: GitHub Actions: Update actions/checkout to v6 (PR #92)
description: Review and merge PR #92: Update actions/checkout action to v6. GitHub Actions maintenance update.

title: GitHub Actions: Update actions/setup-node to v6 (PR #91)
description: Review and merge PR #91: Update actions/setup-node action to v6. GitHub Actions maintenance update.

title: Security: Bump path-to-regexp and express (PR #86)
description: Review and merge PR #86: Bump path-to-regexp and express. Security vulnerability fix from Dependabot.

title: Security: Bump micromatch to 4.0.8 (PR #84)
description: Review and merge PR #84: Bump micromatch from 4.0.5 to 4.0.8. Security update from Dependabot.

title: Security: Bump webpack to 5.94.0 (PR #83)
description: Review and merge PR #83: Bump webpack from 5.91.0 to 5.94.0. Security update from Dependabot.

title: Security: Bump ws to 7.5.10 (PR #82)
description: Review and merge PR #82: Bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10. Security update from Dependabot.

title: Security: Bump braces to 3.0.3 (PR #81)
description: Review and merge PR #81: Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3. Security update from Dependabot.

title: Major Update: React monorepo to v19 (PR #88)
description: Review and merge PR #88: Update react monorepo to v19 (major). This is a major version update that may require code changes and testing.

title: Major Update: react-router-dom to v7 (PR #87)
description: Review and merge PR #87: Update dependency react-router-dom to v7. Major version upgrade with potential breaking changes.

title: Major Update: @testing-library/react to v16 (PR #80)
description: Review and merge PR #80: Update dependency @testing-library/react to v16. Major version update for testing library.

title: Security Vulnerabilities: Migrate from react-scripts to modern build tool
description:
The remaining 10 security vulnerabilities are all in react-scripts 5.0.1 and its dependencies. Create React App is no longer maintained, and react-scripts has known vulnerabilities that cannot be fixed without breaking changes.

Root causes:
- nth-check <2.0.1 (HIGH): ReDoS vulnerability
- postcss <8.4.31 (MODERATE): Line return parsing error  
- webpack-dev-server <=5.2.0 (MODERATE): Source code theft vulnerabilities

Solution: Migrate from react-scripts to a modern build tool like Vite or Next.js.

This epic tracks the migration effort to eliminate all remaining vulnerabilities.

title: Research migration options: Vite vs Next.js vs other modern build tools
description:
Research and document the best path forward for migrating away from react-scripts.

Options to evaluate:
1. Vite - Fast, modern, simple migration path for SPAs
2. Next.js - Full framework with SSR/SSG capabilities
3. Remix - Modern full-stack framework
4. Manual webpack/esbuild config

Criteria:
- Migration effort (code changes required)
- Build performance
- Developer experience
- Long-term maintenance
- Security posture
- Compatibility with current dependencies (react-router-dom v7, React 18)

Deliverable: Document with recommendation and migration plan

title: Migrate build configuration from react-scripts to chosen tool
description:
Migrate the project build configuration from react-scripts to the chosen modern build tool.

Tasks:
- Remove react-scripts dependency
- Add new build tool dependencies
- Configure build tool (vite.config.js or equivalent)
- Update package.json scripts
- Configure environment variables
- Set up asset handling (images, CSS, etc.)
- Configure dev server
- Set up production build optimization

Ensure:
- All current features work (routing, images, CSS)
- Dev server hot reload works
- Production builds are optimized
- Build output structure is compatible with deployment

title: Update all code and imports for new build tool
description:
Update source code to work with the new build tool.

Changes likely needed:
- Update environment variable access (process.env.PUBLIC_URL, etc.)
- Update asset imports if syntax changes
- Update CSS import syntax if needed
- Fix any HMR-specific code
- Update testing configuration
- Remove react-scripts specific code (setupTests.js changes if needed)

Test:
- All pages render correctly
- Routing works (HashRouter)
- Images load properly
- CSS styles apply
- Development mode works with hot reload

title: Run security audit and verify all vulnerabilities resolved
description:
After migration is complete, verify all security vulnerabilities are resolved.

Steps:
1. Run npm audit
2. Verify 0 vulnerabilities (or only low/info level)
3. Check that all HIGH and MODERATE vulnerabilities are gone:
   - nth-check ReDoS
   - postcss parsing error
   - webpack-dev-server source theft issues
4. Document the final security posture
5. Update GitHub security advisories if needed

Success criteria:
- npm audit shows 0 high/moderate/critical vulnerabilities
- All dependencies are up to date
- Build and tests pass

title: Update deployment configuration and CI/CD
description:
Update deployment configuration to work with the new build tool.

Updates needed:
- GitHub Actions workflow (.github/workflows/main.yml)
- Update build commands in CI
- Update deployment scripts if any
- Verify Vercel deployment still works
- Update any documentation about building/deploying

Test:
- CI builds pass
- Deployment to Vercel succeeds
- Production site works correctly
- All routes are accessible
